C-Project Path.description: The project path to modify tags on (<GROUP>/<PROJECT> format)

C-Subject.description: The subject (ID or Label) that you want to modify tags on

C-Session.description: The session (ID or Label) that you want to modify tags on

C-Acquisition.description: The acquisition (ID or Label) that you want to modify tags on

C-File.description: The file name that you want to modify tags on

D-Process Child Subjects.description: Perform tag action on all child Subject containers. If false, only operates on the specified container

D-Process Child Sessions.description: Perform tag action on all child Session containers. If false, only operates on the specified container

D-Process Child Acquisitions.description: Perform tag action on all child Acquisition containers. If false, only operates on the specified container

D-Process Child Analyses.description: Perform tag action on all child Analysis containers. If false, only operates on the specified container

D-Process Child Files.description: Perform tag action on all child files. If false, only operates on the specified container

E-Child File Filter.description: a regex to filter child files - only apply tags to child files that match this filter

F-Query.description: An advanced search string (query) to filter all your results with.  The tags will only be modified on a container if it is returned by this query AND matches the specifications above.

A-Action.description:
Set the type of action you would like to take.  Options are: 
 'Append Tag: Add the specified tag if not already present.
'Remove Tag': remove the specified tag if present.
'Remove and append': Remove all existing tags and add the specified tag.
'Remove all': removes all existing tags

B-Tags.description: The specified tag(s) add or remove, comma separated

file.description: A dicom file to change the tag of the parent acquisition.  Ignores all config settings in config except 'action' and 'tags' if present
